official_title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act to prohibit discrimination against employees of predecessor employers under such Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Service Contract Act to prohibit discrimination in hiring by Government contractors or subcontractors against employees of predecessor employers under such Act. Provides for reduction in numbers or replacement of such employees having the least seniority, under specified circumstances.
